column3: Force pushed with ideas by @kiminuo and @shaavan. Thanks!

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14752](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14752) (tests: Unit tests for IsPayToWitnessScriptHash and IsWitnessProgr
I am reading satoshis in groups of 4 :sweat_smile:
> I am reading satoshis in groups of 4 :sweat_smile: \n\nSame!

Maybe it would be worth checking two-dots cases like:

```cpp
ParseMoney("..")
ParseMoney("0..0")
```

From whitespace characters, I can see covered spaces but not tabulators (for example; pattern for `TrimString` is `const std::string& pattern = "  
	\v"`). Maybe it would be good to add tests for this too.
